feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 5:13PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND LOCALIZED AREAS OF BLOWING AND DRIFTING SNOW THROUGH WEDNESDAY... Northeast winds will continue to strengthen across the Matanuska Valley this evening and then peak late tonight into Wednesday afternoon. Wind gusts are expected to reach 40 to 50 mph late tonight and Wednesday before starting to diminish some Wednesday
entry.cap:areaDesc: Matanuska Valley
